Room.Name: Under South Bridge
Room.ShortDescription: You are under the South Bridge, behind a wooden shack.
Room.LongDescription: The entrance to the shack is on the north side, but there appears to be a back door here. there are a lot of wine bottles lying on the ground and the smell of urine and vomit is strong. An old mattress is against the bridge buttress, and a few dirty dishes are around a campfire.
